description: A React component page for displaying, editing, and deleting a note identified by an ID, using Next.js features like routing and hooks.

methods.name: NoteDetailPage
methods.description: React component for rendering the note detail page with delete and edit functionalities.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch note data by ID and update state.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Function to confirm and delete the note, then redirect to home.
